content: Thomas, this is fantastic! Thank you for consistently creating value. I love this post, and I just saw this exact idea in action. Let me affirm you — you’re spot on! I just got back from vacation. Yes, vacation is always good — getting away and taking a break. Slowing down. But this one was different for me. I didn’t have the usual “return dread.” While walking the beach and hearing the music of the waves and the wind, I realized that there is music all around me. No, I may not have a beach at home, but there are small moments that call out to me every day. Often, I don’t take the time to listen. Vacation reset my thinking in that way so that I was actually excited to put some of these things into practice when I got home. Thank you for sharing this! I really appreciate you and your writing. Keep up the good work!
